data.title: B Site Execute Fakeout + Blindside
data.description: Enable yourself when executing the B Site with this combination of flashes from Garden. You could use your Gatecrash towards backsite as well, as your flash will blind Defenders looking towards Garden and Hookah.

data.title: Informational Dimensional Drift For A Lamps From A Bath
data.description: This Dimensional Drift can be useful for gathering information on players inside of A Lamps, to assist your teammate's push inside of Site, or get the attention of Defenders on A Site so that your team can take B Site.

data.title: Hookah To B Site Blindside For Right Side B Site
data.description: This Blindside is useful for forcing players to stop holding angles from the right side of  B Site onto Hookah at least momentarily. Be careful though, since players don't have to un-peek for very long to be able to re-peek even if they don't avoid getting flashed, and since the enemy team may be aware of this as well, they may try to pre-fire your peek even as they are flashed before they un-peek.

data.title: Early Round A Link Gatecrash To Rotate From B Site
data.description: This is useful because it both allows you to get the attention of the defenders on A Site early in the round, which can bait and/or delay a potential rotate onto A Site, and strengthen the push onto A Site.

data.title: Early Round B Link Gatecrash To Rotate From A Site
data.description: This is useful because it both allows you to get the attention of the defenders on A Site early in the round, which can bait and/or delay a potential rotate onto B Site, and strengthen the push onto B Site.
